CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 25, 1956, pg. 26 reads: "Danced - Shapely Loretta King earned sustained applause as one of the dance soloists at the Freshman Club's sweetheart ball at Gateway Plaza. She is the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Douglas King, proprietors of the B& M Restaurants. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Loretta King wearing dance costume for performance during the Freshman Club's sweetheart ball, Gateway Plaza
